item.title: Front-end Shorts: Fetch List of Resources From REST-API
item.description: Today I am going to tell you how to get JSON data from the Rest-API to UI using React+Redux frameworks. In my case, the task looks like: I have a URL, for example: https://api.com/v1/expenses/ which will give the following JSON data, and I want to get this data in my UI. To solve this task, I decided to use JavaScriptâ€™s fetch method. So in this way, I shouldn’t rely on any external libraries (given my target browsers are remotely up-to-date).
